original_title: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (2.5kg pack of 2, Turquoise Blue)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 2.5kg Pair (2 x 2.5kg), Turquoise Blue Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Slip Vinyl Coating & Cast-Iron Core, Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

key_features: Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
Smooth, anti-slip neoprene finish ensures a comfortable and secure grip
Prevents rolling and provides safe, stable placement on any surface
image_analysis.usage: strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
image_analysis.ai_description: The product consists of vibrant, hexagonal dumbbells with a thick, smooth coating. Images show them in various colors including light blue, turquoise blue, red, green, pink, and purple. One image demonstrates the construction by peeling back the pink coating to reveal a dark metallic core. An infographic highlights features like the vinyl coating, color-coding by weight, and hexagon shape to prevent rolling. A lifestyle shot shows a woman holding a purple dumbbell alongside benefits of exercise. The dumbbells have a matte, non-slip finish and are presented as new condition.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick neoprene coating prevents slipping and is gentle on hands.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl cracks and peels off after minimal use.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal shape prevents rolling for safe, stable placement.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll away dangerously during workouts.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Professional cast-iron core ensures long-term durability.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget weights feel hollow and break easily.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Vibrant, color-coded finish is durable and easy to clean.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-quality paint chips and stains permanently.
